title: Best of CCK: The Francisco Lindor Era Begins
description:
KFC and The Rocket talk baseball as a new era for the NY Mets begins. KFC guarantees the Mets will sign Lindor to an extension. A caller claims the Mets have already signed George Springer


You can find every episode of this show on Apple Podcasts, Spotify or YouTube. Prime Members can listen ad-free on Amazon Music. For more, visit barstool.link/kfcr
dc:creator: Barstool Sports
